about_the_game:
SVFI Transparent Footage Support:

Unlock the power of properly processing footage with alpha or transparent channels by purchasing this DLC. With SVFI Transparent Footage Support, you can seamlessly preserve the alpha channel and export .png or .tiff image sequences or Apple ProRes .mov files in yuva444p12le profile. Without this DLC or the professional version, SVFI will not retain the output of the transparent channel.

THIS DLC IS ALREADY INCLUDED IN PROFESSIONAL VERSION
detailed_description:
SVFI Transparent Footage Support:

Unlock the power of properly processing footage with alpha or transparent channels by purchasing this DLC. With SVFI Transparent Footage Support, you can seamlessly preserve the alpha channel and export .png or .tiff image sequences or Apple ProRes .mov files in yuva444p12le profile. Without this DLC or the professional version, SVFI will not retain the output of the transparent channel.

name: SVFI - Transparent Footage Support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: Unlock the power of processing footage with alpha channels. This allows you to seamlessly preserve the alpha channel and export files in various formats. Without this DLC or the professional version, SVFI will not retain the output of the transparent channel.

Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
